firstJob.description: Identifying and documenting bugs to ensure optimal game performance and quality

responsibilities.first: Detect and report game bugs, glitches, and inconsistencies
responsibilities.second: Perform regression testing to verify bug fixes
responsibilities.third: Provide feedback on game usability and player experience
responsibilities.fourth: Test game features on various platforms and devices
responsibilities.fifth: Suggest improvements for gameplay and user interface design

secondJob.description: Developing a mobile application using React Native (Expo) framework

responsibilities.first: Development of a mobile application focused on organizing and managing services for a hardware store, with features similar to delivery platforms.
responsibilities.second: Implementation of the user interface using React Native (Expo), optimizing the experience on iOS and Android devices.
responsibilities.third: Creation of a robust backend in Django to handle business logic, user authentication, and service management.
responsibilities.fourth: Integration of RESTful APIs for communication between the frontend and backend, ensuring efficient and secure data transmission.
responsibilities.fifth: Design and implementation of databases to manage services and users.

thirdJob.description: Development of web applications and APIs

responsibilities.first: Design and implementation of responsive web applications using modern technologies such as React, Python, and Django.
responsibilities.second: Creation of RESTful APIs to enable communication between frontend and backend systems.
responsibilities.third: Integration of third-party services and APIs to enhance application functionality.
responsibilities.fourth: Collaboration with clients to understand project requirements and deliver customized solutions.
responsibilities.fifth: Maintenance and support of existing applications, including bug fixes and performance optimization.

discordBot.name: Discord Bot
discordBot.description: Developed a Discord bot that can be used to manage a server, play music, and more.

pongGame.name: Pong Game
pongGame.description: Developed a Pong game using Python and Pygame, with local multiplayer support.

footballTeamBalancer.name: Football Team Balancer [WIP]
footballTeamBalancer.description: Developed a web application that can be used to balance football teams.

portfolio.name: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Developed my personal portfolio using React and Tailwind CSS.

drinkMaker.name: Drink Maker
drinkMaker.description: Developed with a friend a drink maker website using ingredients from a database.

machineLearning.name: Machine Learning
machineLearning.description: Expert in building and training neural networks using Keras for various ML tasks.

webDevelopment.name: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Experience with React, Django, and TailwindCSS to build responsive web applications.

dataScience.name: Data Science
dataScience.description: Experience with Pandas, Numpy, and Matplotlib for data analysis and visualization.

etlPipelines.name: ETL Pipelines
etlPipelines.description: Knowledge in designing and implementing ETL pipelines for efficient data processing and transformation.

databases.name: SQL & NoSQL Databases
databases.description: Skills in SQL and NoSQL database design and management for efficient data storage and retrieval.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I am a software developer with experience in web and mobile application development. I am passionate about technology and enjoy working on challenging projects that allow me to learn and grow. I am proficient in various programming languages and frameworks, and I am always looking for new opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills.
